code: import React from'react';import Header from'../components/header.jsx';import bannerapropos from'../assets/bannerapropos.png';import'../app.scss';import Collapse from"../components/collapse.jsx";import apropos from'../aproposdata.js';import'../styles/components/_collapse.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Aproposdata(){function getContent(title){switch(title){case"fiability":return apropos.fiabilite;case"respect":return apropos.respect;case"service":return apropos.service;case"sécurity":return apropos.securite;default:console.log("default");break;}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"divbannerapropos",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bannerapropos,className:"bannerapropos",alt:"banniere \xE0 propos"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"divaproposliste",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{title:"Fiabilit\xE9",content:getContent("fiability")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{title:"Respect",content:getContent("respect")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{title:"Service",content:getContent("service")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{title:"S\xE9curit\xE9",content:getContent("sécurity")})]})]});}export default Aproposdata;
